attributes.action: declare a "STATE OF EMERGENCY FOR THE ENVIRONMENT"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is subject to the law, & is paid by the people, through taxation, to ENACT THE LAW.
To knowingly injure your neighbour is reckless & criminal.
To knowingly, cause un-necessary, and/or unreasonable damage or pollution to the environment (which you, your family, & YOUR NEIGHBOUR live in), IS to knowingly cause injury to yourself, your family, & your neighbour, & is therefore reckless & criminal.

THe government has, & continues, knowingly to pass ILLEGAL ACTS OF PARLIAMENT allowing un-necessary, & unreasonable damage or pollution to the environment, & omits to control it, to the degree that this threat is now as serious as a war (according to the Secretary General of the United Nations on 01-March-2007).

The government is therefore RECKLESS & CRIMINAL in it's Duty of Care for the environment.

It is illegal to pay someone to commit a criminal act.

It is therefore ILLEGAL TO PAY TAX UNTIL THE GOVERNMENT DECLARES A "STATE OF EMERGENCY FOR THE ENVIRONMENT".
